name: Ixmail
body:
# IxMail ASP.NET Templating Email ## Requirement .Net 4 or later ## Dependencies RazorEngine read more at [https://github.com/Antaris/RazorEngine](RazorEngine) ## Install using package manager console visual studio PM> Install-Package IxMail after installation you will see you `web.config` change like this : and change with your account. ```c# ``` *** Now add this class, wich this class will become your object to send your mail ``` public class IxMailTes { public string Name { get; set; } public string UserName { get; set; } public bool IsActive { get; set; } } ``` and run this code below : ``` IxMailTes imt = new IxMailTes(); imt.Name = "My Name"; imt.UserName = "My User Name"; imt.IsActive = true; IxWebMail IWW = new IxWebMail(); IWW.BuildBody(imt, "yourtemplate") .EmailTo("yourmail") .EmailSubject("Activation") .Send(); ``` there is 2 options method to send * 1. You can send it live with `.Send()`. * 2. Or you can send it as background process, this will be improves, when your application with big transactions, I recommend use this `SendBackground()`. After you run all codes above, you will see hidden directory (folder) in your project, directory address is **/Views/IxMail**, and you can put your template there. *** example template with html/txt ``` Hallo {{Name}}
Your user name is {{UserName}}
is Active? {{IsActive}} Visit ``` The separator of `{{Object}}` would be replaced with your values. *** example template with cshtml with razor syntax ``` @model dynamic @{ string strUrl = Model.Url.Request.Url.AbsoluteUri; }

Wellcome

Dear @Model.Name

Information User : @Model.UserName
Active: @Model.IsActive

Please Click here to activate your account.
``` In cshtml you cannot use syntax such us `@Url.Content`,`@Url.Action`, etc. so you just call it with `@Model.Url.Bla Bla Bla`. *** you can also trace your error log when email sent or fail, just look into directory **/Views/IxMail** i hope this helps Thanks cheers :D if you got any error or something that makes you confused, you can email me ix.habibi@gmail.com
